title: Nuclear energy - global market size by segment through 2030
summary: This statistic shows the global market of various Spent_nuclear_fuel_reprocessing_and_secondary_fuel in the size Spent_nuclear_fuel_reprocessing_and_secondary_fuel global in 2030 and .
In 2030 , 17 % of all Spent_nuclear_fuel_reprocessing_and_secondary_fuel worldwide were made out of Front_end_of_fuel_cycle .

data.Power Type: Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel

gold: The global nuclear energy market is expected to grow over the next years , with the nuclear generation segment reaching 300 billion U.S. dollars.
In addition to the already operable nuclear reactors all over the world , there are also nuclear reactors currently under construction , most notably in China , Russia , and India.
In these countries , there are also several reactors being planned and in various stages of approval , funding , or major commitments already in place .
